comments.body: this is called every time every a pod is created with dockershim... this seems late/frequent to be warning about disabled credential providers

I tried logging the warning in the providers' `init()` functions, but it turns out that's too early -- klog has not yet been initialized at that point, so the log level hasn't been set yet which means the the log never gets printed even with `--v=4`. I ended up using a `sync.Once` to avoid logging it repeatedly which feels a little clunky but works.
